# ApiPaymentCampaignFileSaveRequestDto

**Properties**

| Name  | Type    | Required | Description                                       |
| :---- | :------ | :------- | :------------------------------------------------ |
| id    | String  | ❌       | Unique identifier for your payments link in Asaas |
| main  | Boolean | ❌       | true to set as the main image                     |
| image | byte[]  | ❌       | File                                              |
